action_input: A cinematic high-angle shot looking down at a man with short hair, glasses, and a goatee, wearing a grey polo shirt and khaki cargo pants, leaning casually against a sleek, modified Ducati . The scene is set at night under a single warm streetlight that creates soft shadows and golden highlights. The motor's polished surface has glimmering reflections of the city lights. The man faces the camera with a calm, confident expression. Captured with high detail, 8k resolution, realistic textures, and a shallow depth of field, mimicking an 85mm f/1.4 lens.
